alert.note: Alert for Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 4:55AM PST until December 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation Highway 28 southward, snow Highway 28 northward. Additional snow accumulations south of Highway 28 up to 2 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. 1 to 3 inches with locally 3 to 6 inches north of Highway 28. * WHERE...Ritzville, Harrington, Wilbur, Creston, Grand Coulee, Odessa, and Coulee City. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
